resources.string: Support for deckstrings. You can now paste decks copied from the game. Just click \"new deck\" after copying your deck.\nMark HSReplay.net uploads as Arena when needed\nYou can now edit the win/loss counter.

Fixed a bug that prevented the tracker to detect new arena runs if your hero was golden.\nIncreased the time we wait for logs to complete at the end of a game. This should fix some instances where the logs are not uploaded to hsreplay.net.\nImproved french translations.
Added support for the Frozen Throne extension.
Fixed a crash at startup for devices on kitkat and below.
Fixed a crash when clicking \'new deck\'\nImproved the HSReplay.net settings.

Secret tracker: long press a secret in your opponent deck to determine which secrets are/are not possible.
Show the creator of gift cards when possible.
Add support for Android Oreo.
Allow to paste custom deckstrings.
Secret tracker: fix sometimes Vaporize or Effigy badly detected.\nAdded Elise the trailblazer gift card support.\nDisplay the notification again in Android O.
Fixed a couple of crashes, improved memory usage.
Fixed detection of Nemsy.\nRank/mode detection using screen capture (beta).
Marin the fox is now tracked by Arcane Tracker!\nFixed the auto-selection of decks based on mulliganed cards.\nCrash fixes.

Kobold and Catacombs!
Added german translations (Thanks AceXare and Cyco).
Only show standard secrets in the secret detector if playing a standard game.
Fixed utf8 encoding of hsreplay uploads.

Bye bye Corridor Creeper… Cards have been nerfed.
Added italian support (Thanks Mariodm !).
Fixed some card names in hsreplay.net replays.
Special handling of Hoarding Dragon, Deck of wonders and some K&C cards.
Display all gift cards on a single line.
New arena cards !\nImproved italian support (Thanks Mariodm and Silvano!).\nFixed a error message about HSReplay displayed even if you have not opted-in.
Automatic deck detection!
The witchwood!\nPolish translations (Thanks Sarenka !).
You can now delete decks.
Updated for latest nerfs, no more Call To Arms turn 4!\nFixed secret detector in the kraken year.\nImproved german translations (Thanks AceXare!).
Added Tavern of time cards.\nSwitching some menus to a black theme.
Boomsday project !
Initial support for Whizbang decks.\nFixed some glitches when displaying possible secrets.
Fix Sir Annoy-o-Tron detection.\nUpdated for nerfs.
Fix King Rastakhan detection.\nAdded new classic cards.
Arcane Tracker is now the official HSReplay.net Android Deck Tracker!\nSupport for Rastakhan’s Rumble!
Fixed an issue where replays where not shown in \'my replays\'\nUpdated Whizbang decks for Rastakhan\'s Rumble.
Add support for Madam Lazul.\nFixed some issues connecting to HSReplay.net.
Rise of the Shadow support.\nUpdated Whizbang recipes\nRemove auto-hide as it was sometimes triggering unexpectedly.
Add back "Auto-Hide" as an opt-in setting. You can enable this if you want the overlay to hide in landscape mode.
Support for Zayle shadow cloak.
Updated for nerfs.\nFixed a bug where the detailed stats where not updated.
Updated for buffs and SN1P-SN4P.
Updated for patch 14.6. Farewell Mind Blast...
Disable screen capture until Hearthstone stops disconnecting

Added a turn timer
Tentative fix for the "Auto-restart issue" on Galaxy S10
Added a message when a Hearthstone restart is required
Fixed "Magnetized minions not showing in opponent's Deck"
Fixed "Text is white on white when changing the win/loss count"
Saviors of Uldum!
Add Uldum secrets in ranked.\nUpdate Whizbang decks.
Updated for nerfs.\nAdded Tracking for generated Uldum cards.
Hallow\'s end is there!
Add Sathrovarr.
Battlegrounds support.
Update for patch 16.0.0.37060.
Battlegrounds now has its own icon.\nAdd battlegrounds minions tiers.
